TopicTitle: Screamjet: a new hybrid engine SSTO capable

Articles.Content:
Hi! I was tired of change the aesthetics of my airplanes to convert them into SSTO, due the need of one or more rocket engine; So i have create a new hybrid jet (rapier alike): the Screamjet, capable of a good weight/thrust ratio and a good fuel consuption.

This new engine is good for reach hypersonic speeds with your airplanes (a plane capable of 1700 m/s with normal jets can reach more than 2000m/s with my new engine) at the cost of add a bit of oxygen. It's also very good for build SSTOs.

INFORMATIONS:

-parts count: about 20 depends on version

-MAX Thrust: 303

-Max rocket thrust: 78

-toal combined mass: 1.66

The Screamjet comes in a 3 versions pack.

INSTALLATION:

copy the 3 craft files into your subassemblies folder.

for the Screamjet V3 just place it in your craft and add a turbojet engine and a fuel duct (without fuel duct can't work).
